prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra, chibi proportions with large prismatic structured sacred head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying structure. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, nested patterns, styled with Power commands influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with structure spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor LAZHIIM's profile: 'He who makes use of the day', Aethyr DES, Earth element, Tarot The Hierophant, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'As LAZHIIM approaches, potential is swiftly seized every opportunity is efficiently utilized, and productivity flows with grounded ease.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered blessing pose with both hands raised in sacred mudra
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic structured sacred head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying structure
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, nested patterns, styled with Power commands influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who makes use of the day'
profile_data.essence: As LAZHIIM approaches, potential is swiftly seized every opportunity is efficiently utilized, and productivity flows with grounded ease.
profile_data.angelic_role: Power of Mastery of the Moment; commands earth-forged guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic earth-crystal form that embodies structured potential, with faceted surfaces representing the precise moment of transformation between potential and actualized action. Inspired by Metatron's Cube and sacred geometric principles of crystalline manifestation.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Earth element colors representing grounded power, with bronze signifying alchemical transformation and olive green symbolizing material manifestation and growth potential
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure from sacred geometry represents perfect structural integrity, fractal patterns indicate infinite potential within each moment
